seo.title: Digital Commerce Solutions for Business Growth
seo.description: 99Digicom helps businesses setup, manage, advertise, and co-brand across top marketplaces. Get expert solutions for e-commerce growth and digital success.
seo.keywords: digital commerce, e-commerce solutions, marketplace management, ONDC integration, co-branding, digital marketing, online business

hero.subtitle: Setup, Manage, Advertise, and Co-Brand across all Top marketplaces.

sellerSetup.title: Seller Account Setup
sellerSetup.backText: We offer end-to-end onboarding, document handling, and account activation across major Indian marketplaces to get you selling fast.

accountManagement.title: Account Management
accountManagement.backText: We handle cataloging, listing updates, return resolution, performance monitoring, and keyword-rich SEO optimization.

advertising.title: Advertising & Marketing
advertising.backText: Our campaigns use keyword targeting, A/B testing, and attractive creatives to improve visibility, clicks, and conversions.

cobranding.title: Co-Branding Solutions
cobranding.backText: We connect you with influencers and allied brands for bundled offerings, joint campaigns, and visibility spikes across platforms.

ecosystem.headline: Seamless Integration, Maximum Reach
ecosystem.content: We deeply understand the entire landscape. From Amazon & Flipkart to Meesho, Jiomart, ONDC, Swiggy & Zomato, we provide unified expertise across all major platforms. One partner, infinite possibilities.

strategy.headline: Platform-First Optimization
strategy.content: We craft bespoke strategies for each channel's unique algorithms, audience, and best practices. Our Platform Enablement & Account Management services ensure your brand thrives where it matters most.

growth.headline: ROI-Focused Advertising & Marketing
growth.content: Your ad spend is an investment. We leverage advanced analytics and platform-specific tools to target precisely, optimize relentlessly, and deliver measurable sales growth and customer acquisition.

partnership.headline: Amplify Reach Through Smart Alliances
partnership.content: Unlock exponential growth beyond solo efforts. Our Co-Branding Solutions identify and execute win-win partnerships, leveraging combined audiences and credibility to create unique value and enter new markets effectively.

brand.headline: Your Brand, Our Obsession
brand.content: We protect and elevate your brand equity. From consistent platform presentation and reputation management to strategic co-branding alignment, we ensure every digital touchpoint strengthens your brand identity and trust.

innovation.headline: Future-Proof Your Digital Presence
innovation.content: The digital landscape evolves daily. We proactively monitor platform updates, emerging trends, and algorithm shifts, adapting your strategy swiftly to keep you ahead of the curve and capitalize on new opportunities.

team.headline: Your Dedicated Growth Squad
team.content: Experience true partnership. You get assigned experts in Account Management, Platform Ops, and Marketing who know your business intimately, provide transparent communication, and act as a seamless extension of your team.

results.headline: We Deliver What Matters: Growth
results.content: Don't just take our word for it. We focus on measurable outcomes: Increased market share, higher conversion rates, reduced customer acquisition costs, stronger brand recall, and scalable revenue growth.

why.heading: Why Choose Us?
why.description:
We simplify your selling journey with a hassle-free setup process, dedicated support, and years of marketplace expertise. With a proven 90%+ customer retention rate, we ensure sellers not only launch but grow with us.

Trust 99digicom to deliver excellence at every stage of your e-commerce growth.

The E-commerce Partner You Can Trust.

setup.title: Hassle-Free Setup
setup.description: Enjoy a simplified and smooth onboarding process to get your selling journey started quickly.

support.title: Dedicated Support
support.description: Benefit from personalized assistance and expert guidance throughout your e-commerce growth.

expertise.title: Marketplace Expertise
expertise.description: Leverage years of proven experience in the e-commerce marketplace to optimize your sales.

retention.title: High Customer Retention
retention.description: Join a community of successful sellers, reflected in our over 90% customer retention rate.

benefits.heading: Our Benefits
benefits.description: Comprehensive solutions to elevate your eCommerce business across all platforms

seo.title: About 99Digicom - Your Partner in Digital Commerce
seo.description: 99Digicom helps businesses establish and grow their digital presence on India’s top marketplaces. Learn about our story, mission, and expertise.
seo.keywords: 99Digicom, about us, company profile, digital commerce, e-commerce solutions, mission, vision

hero.subtitle: Learn more about who we are and what we do at 99Digicom.

section1.heading: Our Mission
section1.paragraph1: At 99Digicom, our mission is to empower businesses to succeed in India’s rapidly growing digital commerce landscape. We understand that the complexities of online marketplaces can be overwhelming, and our goal is to streamline this process, allowing our clients to focus on their core competencies.
section1.paragraph2: We achieve this by providing end-to-end solutions across major platforms like Amazon, Flipkart, Meesho, Jiomart, and ONDC. From account setup and management to advertising and co-branding strategies, we equip our clients with the tools and expertise needed to achieve digital success.

section2.heading: Our Vision
section2.paragraph1: We envision a future where every business, regardless of size, can harness the vast potential of digital marketplaces. We see ourselves as India’s leading provider of digital commerce solutions, known for innovation, reliability, and customer-centricity.
section2.paragraph2: Our goal is not just to establish a digital presence but to sustain and optimize it for continuous growth and long-term success.

section3.heading: Our Team
section3.paragraph1: Our team comprises seasoned professionals with deep expertise in all facets of digital commerce. From marketing specialists to technical gurus, we work collaboratively to bring a results-driven approach.
section3.paragraph2: We believe our success is inseparable from our clients’ success. Hence, we strive to build strong partnerships with each client, understanding their unique needs and delivering tailored solutions to achieve their business aspirations.

partnership.title: Partnership First
partnership.description: We believe growth is better when shared. Every seller, manufacturer, and collaborator is treated as a long-term partner.

enable.title: Enable, Don’t Just Offer
enable.description: We don’t just provide access — we enable success with services like onboarding, content creation, co-branding, and ads.

performance.title: Performance with Purpose
performance.description: Our strategies are ROI-focused but always aligned with ethical, sustainable, and customer-centric goals.

simplify.title: Simplify Digital for All
simplify.description: Our mission is to make digital commerce accessible, affordable, and manageable — even for first-time sellers.

goals.heading: Our Long-Term Goals
goals.first: Onboard 10,000+ sellers to digital commerce by 2027
goals.second: Become the preferred platform for co-branded e-commerce marketing
goals.third: Build a network of multi-platform success stories from the heart of India
goals.fourth: Expand services to include training, fulfillment, and international market access

journey.heading: Our Journey
journey.paragraph1: Founded in 2021, 99Digicom began with a vision to empower small and medium businesses in India’s digital commerce ecosystem.
journey.paragraph2: Our journey is fueled by innovation, collaboration, and a passion for helping businesses thrive in the digital age.
journey.paragraph3: Starting as a small team of digital commerce enthusiasts, we’ve grown into a comprehensive enablement platform. Today, we’re proud to be official integration partners with Amazon, Flipkart, ONDC, and other major platforms.
journey.paragraph4: Looking ahead, we’re committed to staying at the forefront of digital commerce innovation, helping Indian businesses reach their full potential in digital marketplaces.
journey.imageAlt: 99Digicom team collaborating on digital marketplace solutions
